colorGray.description: Value of color in gray space (0.0 - 1.0)

colorRGB.description: Value of color in RGB space. All 3 components in range (0.0 - 1.0).

rect.description: Rectangle/Box in PDF coordinate system (bottom-left is origin). Values are in PDF user space units. Order of values - left, bottom, right, top

version.description: Versions of components used to identify, create and export document's structure tree

ID_instance.description: Modified document identifier. This is same as ID_permanent if the document is not modified.

is_digitally_signed.description: Document is digitally signed or not

page_count.description: Number of pages in the document

has_embedded_files.description: Document contains embedded files or not

is_certified.description: Document has been digitally signed with a certifying signature or not

is_XFA.description: Document is based on the XFA (Extensible Forms Architecture) format or not

language.description: Predominate natural language (as a BCP-47 code) for text in the document

extension_base_version.description: Base version of document's Adobe extensions to ISO 32000 (aka ISO PDF)

extension_level.description: Extension level of document's Adobe extensions to ISO 32000 (aka ISO PDF)

elements.title: List of semantic elements found in the PDF
elements.description: List of semantic elements (like headings, paragraphs, tables, figures) found in the document. List is ordered based on the position of elements in the structure tree of the document. For more information on various elements reported in this list, please visit https://opensource.adobe.com/pdftools-sdk-docs/beta/extract

Bounds.description: Bounding box enclosing the content items forming this element. E.g. For a table cell, this value won't be the boundary of the cell, but union of the bounds of content (text, images etc.) inside the cell. Not reported for elements which don't have any content items (like empty table cells).

ClipBounds.description: Bounding box enlosing the content items, post clipping, forming this element. Only reported if any content item forming this element has an associated clip path. Box in corresponding "Bounds" key always encloses this box.

CharBounds.description: List of bounds for each character in this element

Font.description: Font description for the font associated with the first character. Only reported for text elements.

embedded.description: The font is embedded in the document or not

encoding.description: Font's encoding like WinAnsiEncoding, Identity-H, MacRomanEncoding etc.

family_name.description: Font's family name. Example - For font "Times Bold Italic", family name is "Times"

font_type.description: Font technology (type) - eg. Type 1, TrueType, OpenType

name.description: The PostScript name of the font

subset.description: Font is a subset i.e. only contains some characters from the original font

HasClip.description: Clip path is associated with the element or not. True if at least one content item forming this element has an associated clip path, false otherwise

Lang.description: BCP-47 code for language of text elements

Page.description: Page on which the element is present (zero-based).

Path.description: Path describing the location of the element in the structure tree. The type of the element and instance number are also part of the path. For more information, please visit https://opensource.adobe.com/pdftools-sdk-docs/beta/extract

Text.description: Text for the element in UTF-8 format. Only reported for text elements. When inline elements are reported separately from parent block element, then this value has references to those inline elements. For more information, please visit https://opensource.adobe.com/pdftools-sdk-docs/beta/extract

TextSize.description: Text size (in points) of the last character. Only reported for text elements.

LineHeight.description: Line height (in PDF user units) of the text. Only reported for text elements. Inline elements inherit this value from parent element.

SpaceAfter.description: Amount of padding/spacing (in PDF user units) after the element

TextAlign.description: Horizontal alignment (left, right, center, justified) of text inside the element. Only reported for text elements.

Placement.description: Positioning of the element with respect to the enclosing reference area and other content

BBox.description: Visual bounding box. Only reported for tables and table cells. Useful for getting bounds of the element including borders, if any. Use this to get bounding box of an empty tables/table cells

NumCol.description: Number of columns in the table element

NumRow.description: Number of rows in the table element

TextPosition.description: Position of text - subscript / superscript / normal

StartIndent.description: First line indent (in PDF user units) in text. Only reported for text elements.

TextDecorationThickness.description: Thickness of text decoration (in PDF user Units) rounded off to nearest integer

TextDecorationType.description: Type of text decoration - line-through / underline / overline / none

BlockAlign.description: Vertical placement (top, middle, bottom, justified) of elements inside table cell. Only applicable for table cells.

BorderColor.description: Color of border(s), if any. Single color reported if all 4 borders are of same color. If colors are different, each border color reported individually in order - top, bottom, left, right. Reported for table cells only.

BorderStyle.description: Style of border(s), if any. Single style reported if all 4 borders are of same style. If styles are different, each border style reported individually in order - top, bottom, left, right. Reported for table cells only.

BorderThickness.description: Thickness of border(s), if any, (in PDF user units) rounded off to nearest integer. Single thickness value reported if all 4 borders are of same thickness. If thickness varies, thickness of each border reported individually in order - top, bottom, left, right. Reported for table cells only.

ColIndex.description: Column index of the table cell (zero-based)

Height.description: Height (in PDF user units) of table cell element. Useful for getting table cell dimensions.

InlineAlign.description: Horizontal placement (left, center, right, justified) of elements inside table cell

RowIndex.description: Row index of the table cell (zero-based)

Width.description: Width (in PDF user units) of table cell element. Useful for getting table cell dimensions.

BackgroundColor.description: Background color (if any) of the element. Also used for reporting text highlight color.

BaselineShift.description: Value of offset (in PDF user units) of text from current baseline. Only reported for text elements.

ColSpan.description: Number of columns spanned by a table cell

RowSpan.description: Number of rows spanned by a table cell

Skew.description: Clockwise skew angle (in degrees) of the last character. Only reported for text elements.

Rotation.description: Clockwise rotation angle (in degrees) of the last character. Only reported for text elements.

bits_per_component.description: Bits used for each component of color in a sample

colorspace.description: Description for color space used by the image

Name.description: PDF name of the color space like DeviceGray, CalGray, DeviceRGB, DeviceCMYK, ICCBased e.t.c

ICCProfile.description: ICC profile characteristics of the color space. Reported only when "Name" is "ICCBased".

ColorSpace.description: ICC name of the color space

Colorspace.description: ICC name of the color space

Flags.description: Various bit settings of the profile

NumComps.description: Number of components used to represent a color. Gray = 1, RGB = 3, CMYK = 4, Lab = 3

data_length.description: Number of bytes in image data stream

height.description: Height of the image in PDF user units

width.description: Width of the image in PDF user units

filePaths.description: List of file paths to additional output files (images and spreadsheets). For more information, please see API documentation at https://opensource.adobe.com/pdftools-sdk-docs/beta/extract

pages.description: A list of properties for each page of the PDF

width.description: Width (in PDF user units) of the page.

height.description: Height (in PDF user units) of the page.

rotation.description: Clockwise rotation value of the page (in degrees).

user_units.description: Multiplier on the size of the default user space unit (eg. 1 == 72/inch)

MediaBox.description: Media box of the page. Defines the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page is printed/displayed.

CropBox.description: Crop box of the page. Defines the visible region of the page. Content of the page clipped to this rectangle before print/display.
